articles.title: ABC World News Tonight with David Muir Full Broadcast - Aug. 14, 2025
articles.description: Mary Bruce reports from Anchorage, Alaska, on the eve of the high-stakes summit as Pres. Trump says he believed Russian Pres. Putin “will make peace" with Ukraine, while Putin praises the administration's "energetic and sincere" efforts to end the war; Matt Gutman has details on the group of heavily armed border patrol agents that conducted an immigration raid outside the venue as Gov. Gavin Newsom announced his plan to have voters approve a new redistricting map in California; Victor Oquendo reports on the newly released body camera video showing neighborhood heroes rescuing a family of four from a small plane that crashed in a residential community in Pembroke Pines, Florida last month; and more on tonight's broadcast of World News Tonight with David Muir.
